```{r setup, include=FALSE}
knitr::opts_chunk$set(echo = FALSE)
## target knits Rmds in their own session, so load libraries here.
## source("here::here(packages.R"))
library(tidyverse)
library(here)
```

```{r load-targets, include=FALSE}
awt <- read_csv(here("input_data", "Env", "awt.csv")) %>%
  filter(year > 1980)
```

```{r}
awt_lg <- awt %>%
  pivot_longer(
    -c(siteid, year),
    names_to = "variable",
    values_to = "mv_avg"
  ) %>%
mutate(variable = str_replace_all(variable,
    c("tmp_a_ana" = "air",
      "tmp_w_ama" = "water"
    )
  )
)
```

```{r}
awt_lg_site_avg <- awt %>%
  pivot_longer(
    -c(siteid, year),
    names_to = "variable",
    values_to = "mv_avg"
  ) %>%
mutate(variable = str_replace_all(variable,
    c("tmp_a_ana" = "air",
      "tmp_w_ama" = "water"
    )
  )
) %>%
group_by(year, variable) %>%
summarise(mv_avg = mean(mv_avg, na.rm = TRUE), .groups = "drop")
```

```{r}
awt_lg %>%
  ggplot(aes(x = year, y = mv_avg, color = variable)) +
  geom_smooth()
```
